Subject: Chiptune as an Instrument (It's More Than Just Videogame Songs!!)
Description: The word 'chiptune' has been used as a genre of music, encompassing any/all music made on retro sound chips.  Not so much anymore.  Meet some of the artists breaking into new genres and pushing the limits of the chip sound.  Speakers include:barbeque, snesei, boaconstructor, The One Electronic, Monotony - Track: Music  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none

Subject: So You Want to 8-bit?
Description: Learn the tools tips and tricks for creating both 8-bit music and pixel art from some of the best artists around!  Check out this session if you're new to the chip/pixel world!  Speakers include:Ohhinaifu, The One Electronic, snesei, boaconstructor, barbeque - Track: Music  - Duration: 50 minutes - Audio/video needs: none
